title: Plat 1 Mid Main LFT :)
body:
Hey guys :)

I am 20 years old, student from Germany and I have tons of fun playin league daily. So..

- I speak english fluently
- I actually main AniVia
- Otherwise I can play Ahri, Xerath, Liss, Azir.
- I am a huge eSports Fanboy (some are maybe able to determine my favourite LCS player ;)
- I am willing to improve
- Last season I was diamond 

You guys should:
- an Elo above Plat 3
- being able to play 4-5 times a week
- have fun! :)

with kind regards 
Tobi
inGame:
bird is da word
